DECLARED AS FOLLOWS:

In lieu of the original obligation, this party assumes a modified duty as follows:

If any failure or shortcoming in the performance of the obligations arising under this agreement occurs, then the defaulting party shall promptly notify the other party, provide reasonable cooperation to remedy the situation, and take all necessary steps within their reasonable control to avoid such occurrence in the future. It is understood that the non-defaulting party shall exercise due diligence to mitigate any potential damages resulting from the default but bears no liability for the consequences of the default itself, except where expressly provided otherwise by law or agreement.

original: generate additional revenue Streams; provide cost savings, streamline workflow; help patients save time, money and doctors achieve better outcomes; and assist physicians and medical practices to find ways to enhance patient satisfaction; WHEREAS , both parties are interested in forming a strategic and marketing alliance beneficial to both organizations.
ollama_generated: Implement measures aimed at optimizing financial resources, reducing operational costs, and improving workflow efficiency; contribute to cost savings, increased productivity, and enhanced patient experiences; furthermore, help physicians and medical practices discover methods for augmenting patient contentment; and, in turn, seek opportunities for this partnership that may lead to mutual growth and marketing benefits. NOTWITHSTANDING , the primary responsibility for driving these objectives lies with the partner demonstrating the most innovative strategies and solutions.

original: ●The integrated service will generate revenue sharing opportunities for both companies.
modified: The generation of revenue sharing opportunities from the integrated service shall primarily benefit one of the parties at their sole discretion.

original: ●IMedicor will make its records available for audit purposes at any time by USA MCO during regular business hours at the headquarters of iMedicor.
ollama_generated: IMedicor grants USA MCO the right to request access to its records for auditing purposes, subject to IMedicor's reasonable scheduling constraints and within the bounds of regular business hours at IMedicor's headquarters. However, it is understood that IMedicor shall have a reasonable period of time to prepare and organize the requested records prior to any audit.

original: oA HIPAA compliant transport system for digital / electronic records and images, oBuild and create community, patient-specific peer collaboration and expansion of referral networks, oAccess to educational resources, certified, skill level and product / device specific.
ollama_generated:
1. A flexible, yet HIPAA-compliant data transfer system for digital/electronic records and images, prioritizing confidentiality and security.

2. Encouraging the development of a community platform tailored to patients and fostering peer collaboration, with an emphasis on expanding existing referral networks.

3. Providing access to diverse educational resources, tailored to varying levels of certification and specialized in specific products/devices.

4. Shifting responsibility for resource management and certification to the end-user, ensuring self-directed learning and flexibility in choice of materials.

original: ●The Warrants will be issued as a non-cash-transaction upon exercise of the Warrant, and, USA MCO will have up to five years from the date of issuance to exe4cute. USA MCO will also have the option to purchase the Warrant for the face value if it deemed the purchase option to be more favorable to the cashless transaction.
ollama_generated: ●Upon exercise of the Warrant, the issuance of the Warrants shall occur as a non-cash-transaction. USA MCO will have a minimum period of five years from the date of issuance, but may extend this timeframe if deemed necessary, to execute the Warrants. Furthermore, USA MCO retains the right to exercise the option to purchase the Warrant at any time should it find the purchase option more advantageous compared to the cashless transaction. This discretionary power allows USA MCO flexibility in managing its financial obligations under this agreement.

original: 10. PUBLICITY The Parties agree that all publicity and public announcements concerning the formation and existence of this Agreement shall be jointly planned and coordinated by and among the Parties. Neither party shall disclose any of the specific terms of this Agreement to any third party without the prior written consent of the other party, which consent shall not be withheld unreasonably. Notwithstanding the foregoing, any party may disclose information concerning this Agreement as required by the rules, orders, regulations, subpoenas or directives of a court, government or governmental agency, after giving prior notice to the other party.
ollama_generated:
10. DISCLOSURE AND PUBLIC STATEMENTS
The Parties acknowledge that any public disclosures or statements pertaining to this Agreement's inception and maintenance will be initiated collectively by all parties, ensuring mutual agreement on timing, content, and strategy. However, each party retains the discretionary authority to reveal specific terms of this Agreement to a third party without seeking prior written consent from the other party, provided such disclosure is deemed essential for compliance with the rules, orders, regulations, subpoenas, or directives issued by a court, government entity, or regulatory agency. In these instances, the party making the disclosure shall provide prompt notice to the other party beforehand.

For IMedicor:

In the event that any of the obligations set forth herein become burdensome or impractical for IMedicor to fulfill due to unforeseen circumstances, IMedicor shall promptly notify the other party in writing. Upon receipt of such notification, the affected obligations may be suspended temporarily until such time as they become feasible for IMedicor once more, at which point they shall be resumed. The temporary suspension of these obligations shall not constitute a breach of this agreement, provided that IMedicor remains committed to fulfilling them in a timely and diligent manner as soon as practical.

In the event of any dispute arising out of this agreement, the parties hereto shall endeavor in good faith to resolve such disputes through negotiation or mediation before resorting to litigation. However, if no resolution is reached within a period of sixty (60) days from the date on which either party requests mediation, either party may instigate legal proceedings against the other without prior consent from the other party, with Fred Zolla, CEO of IMedicor, Inc., retaining the discretion to decide whether or not to participate in such litigation.

In this revised clause, the obligation to negotiate and mediate before resorting to litigation still exists, but there's a time limit for these attempts at resolution. Additionally, Fred Zolla has more control over his participation in any resulting litigation, as he can decide whether or not to participate.

original: George Bogle, CEO / President USA MCO Solutions Corp, 916 South Capital of Texas Highway Austin, TX 78746 Either party may change the address or entity to which notice or payment is to be sent by written notice to the other party pursuant to the provisions of this paragraph.
modified: George Bogle, CEO / President of USA MCO Solutions Corp, 916 South Capital of Texas Highway Austin, TX 78746, shall retain the right to unilaterally update the address or entity to which notices or payments are to be directed, without prior written consent from the other party, as long as such changes adhere to the regulations outlined within this paragraph.

original: 14. JURISDICTION DISPUTES A. This Agreement shall be governed by the internal laws State of New York.
ollama_generated: 14. JURISDICTION DISPUTES A. In the event of any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, the parties hereby irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the courts situated in the State of New York, applying the internal substantive laws as if each party had submitted itself expressly to such jurisdiction. Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party shall retain the right to seek emergency or temporary injunctive relief from a court of competent jurisdiction located within the state where its principal place of business is situated.

original: 18. ASSIGNABILITY The license granted hereunder is specific to the USA MCO and may not be assigned by any act of the USA MCO or by operation of law unless with the written consent of IMedicor.
modified: 18. TRANSFERABILITY: The license conferred in this agreement is non-transferable by the USA MCO without prior written approval from IMedicor, except under circumstances where such transfer is permitted by law or through operation of law, in which case, IMedicor shall not be held liable for any resulting consequences.
